sorcer.core.loki.crypt
Class EncryptionManager

java.lang.Object
  sorcer.core.loki.crypt.EncryptionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptionManagement
public class EncryptionManager
extends Object
implements EncryptionManagement

The encryption manager class implements block, stream, and threaded pipe encryption using DES, and AES encryption.

Author:
Daniel Kerr
